JORDAN WHITMER: My name's Jordan Whitmer. I recently just turned 26 years old. I am the founder and global director or CEO of the How to Life Movement ministry.
Jordan Whitmer is the CEO and Founder of the HowToLife Movement. This dynamic ministry is a student-led initiative focused on empowering young people.
